function(add_kmldom_test name)
    add_libkml_test(${name} kmldom)
endfunction()

add_kmldom_test(abstractlatlonbox_test)
add_kmldom_test(abstractview_test)
add_kmldom_test(atom_test)
add_kmldom_test(balloonstyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(colorstyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(container_test)
add_kmldom_test(document_test)
add_kmldom_test(element_test)
add_kmldom_test(extendeddata_test)
add_kmldom_test(feature_test)
add_kmldom_test(folder_test)
add_kmldom_test(geometry_test)
add_kmldom_test(gx_timeprimitive_test)
add_kmldom_test(gx_tour_test)
add_kmldom_test(hotspot_test)
add_kmldom_test(iconstyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(kml22_test)
add_kmldom_test(kml_cast_test)
add_kmldom_test(kml_factory_test)
add_kmldom_test(kml_handler_ns_test)
add_kmldom_test(kml_handler_test)
add_kmldom_test(kml_test)
add_kmldom_test(labelstyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(linestyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(link_test)
add_kmldom_test(liststyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(model_test)
add_kmldom_test(networklinkcontrol_test)
add_kmldom_test(networklink_test)
add_kmldom_test(object_test)
add_kmldom_test(overlay_test)
add_kmldom_test(parser_test)
add_kmldom_test(placemark_test)
add_kmldom_test(polystyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(region_test)
add_kmldom_test(round_trip_test)
add_kmldom_test(schema_test)
add_kmldom_test(serializer_test)
add_kmldom_test(snippet_test)
add_kmldom_test(stylemap_test)
add_kmldom_test(styleselector_test)
add_kmldom_test(style_test)
add_kmldom_test(substyle_test)
add_kmldom_test(timeprimitive_test)
add_kmldom_test(unknown_test)
add_kmldom_test(vec2_test)
add_kmldom_test(visitor_driver_test)
add_kmldom_test(visitor_test)
add_kmldom_test(xal_test)
add_kmldom_test(xml_serializer_test)
add_kmldom_test(xsd_test)
